Full Extension Drawer Slides

Sep 27, 2013 • admin

As a cabinet organizer, you are looking for the high quality full extension drawer slides, then you can easy to find 48″ Draw slides at OVIS division of WIM Corp. They have heavy-duty, telescoping, precision, full extension drawer slides that are specially made for high loads. They have 20 years of experience in this business and offer various length of quality cabinet products with accessories, you can choose the screw length depending on the application.
